definition: hiss/neigh/Ss! (sound of air sucked between the teeth, indicating hesitation or thinking over)
to yell/to shout/to call out for (a person)

sentences.english: Loud rages hoarsely out all of my sad.
sentences.chinese: 大聲的嘶喊出俄所有的心酸。

sentences.english: They yelled whenever they heard any noise outside.
sentences.chinese: 他們只要一聽到外面有動靜就嘶喊。

sentences.english: Tang sugar, on pain of wronged call the sea and wept bitterly.
sentences.chinese: 唐糖對着大海痛苦的嘶喊委屈的痛哭。

sentences.english: Suddenly, the pain became too strong and she screamed hard.
sentences.chinese: 突然，她的痛苦開始變得越來越劇烈，她嘶喊起來。

sentences.english: We meet them in the woods and lanes where we shouted and played as boys.
sentences.chinese: 我們會在童年嘶喊玩耍過的樹林和小道間和它們相遇。

definition: to cry piteously/anguished wailing/same as 哀嚎
to bawl/to cry/to wail/to howl/also written 號哭|号哭[hao2 ku1]
to whinny (of a horse)/to neigh/to shout
very loudly/at the top of one's voice
